title: Biden Must Resign Now (Ep 1585)
description:
Biden must resign now because of this Afghanistan debacle. In this episode, I discuss the ongoing disaster in Kabul and I show troubling video of the chaos.

News Picks:


Afghanistan falls while Biden is on vacation,

General Milley must resign.

The new DHS list of terror threats should raise all kinds of eyebrows. 

Former ambassador to Afghanistan scolds the hapless Biden administration.


Jen Psaki is on vacation as Afghanistan collapses.

Biden White House outs intelligence officials locations in Twitter post.


Clueless Francis Collins calls a mask a “life saving device.”

Another deranged media Covid narrative falls apart when looking at the data.
